identified-content.person: PECHSTEIN, PAIGE ANNE MEERT (PAIGE ANNE MEERT SLATER)

block.p: Paige Anne Meert Pechstein and John Gabriel Talcott Slater Jr. were married yesterday by the Rev. Dr. John Snyder, a Presbyterian minister, at their home in Berwyn, Pa.

Mrs. Slater, 39, is the director of sales and marketing for Josephine Sasso, a fashion designer in New York and Philadelphia. She graduated from the University of Colorado. She is a daughter of Dr. George Richard Pechstein of Oley, Pa., and the late Sally Smith Pechstein. Her father, a retired radiologist, practiced in Bryn Mawr and Pottstown, Pa.
Paige Anne Meert Pechstein and John Gabriel Talcott Slater Jr. were married yesterday by the Rev. Dr. John Snyder, a Presbyterian minister, at their home in Berwyn, Pa.

Mrs. Slater, 39, is the director of sales and marketing for Josephine Sasso, a fashion designer in New York and Philadelphia. She graduated from the University of Colorado. She is a daughter of Dr. George Richard Pechstein of Oley, Pa., and the late Sally Smith Pechstein. Her father, a retired radiologist, practiced in Bryn Mawr and Pottstown, Pa.

Mr. Slater, also 39, is the director of marketing for Harleysville Asset Management in Harleysville, Pa. He graduated from Hamilton College and received an M.B.A. from Columbia. He is the son of Joanna Sadtler Day of Lafayette Hill, Pa., and Mr. Slater Sr. of New York. His father is a retired general partner of Barrington Partners, investment managers in New York.
